alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of central Park County through 545 PM MDT... Showers and thunderstorms over the Paradise valley are likely to produce strong outflow winds over the next hour. These strong gusts will likely spread out well away from the precipitation areas, arriving suddenly. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden strong crosswinds expected along I-90 near Livingston. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building if storms approach. Be prepared for sudden strong wind gusts.
